title: Permission
description: An atomic grant authorizing a specific action (e.g., read, write, execute) on a resource within a defined scope. Permissions are assigned to Roles and enforced by SecureResource access control lists. Implements NIST SP 800-53 AC-3 access enforcement and AC-6 least privilege.

scope.description: Breadth of access granted by this permission, from narrow read-only to full administrative control.

action.description: CRUD-plus operation type this permission governs, per NIST SP 800-53 AC-3 Access Enforcement.
